title: Enjoy The Lifestyle You Deserve In This Unbeatable 3BR Townhome!
posting_body: Beckley Townhomes offers a pristine centralized location with beautiful views and is just a short drive to downtown Dallas.
Residents of Beckley Townhomes truly get the best of both worlds.
We offer a wide array of community amenities including an on-site fitness center, outdoor playground, sparkling outdoor swimming pool, gated entry access and more!
Our 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes include large bedrooms with ample closet space, washer and dryer connections, fully equipped kitchens with a kitchen pantry and ceramic tile entry flooring.
Enjoy distinctive living and the best that Dallas has to offer at Beckley Townhomes.
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Select homes at Beckley Townhomes participate in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $42,000 | 2 Occupants: $48,000 | 3 Occupants: $54,000 | 4 Occupants: $60,000 | 5 Occupants: $64,800 | 6 Occupants: $69,600.
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
